text: Fragments or Winged Creatures is a 2008 crime-drama movie. It is about a group of people dealing with life after a man walks into a deli and shoots one of the main character's father. Fragments stars Dakota Fanning and Kate Beckinsale along with Forest Whittaker. Category:2008 crime drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:American independent movies
title: Fragments (movie)
